title: The Netherlands Commits to “Maintain” ESA Contribution Levels Through 2028
summary:
The Dutch government has decided to contribute €344.3 million to European Space Agency (ESA) over the next three years. The government also announced that, with the addition of its national space programmes, the country would spend a total of €550 million from 2026 to 2028. On 10 October, the country’s Council of Ministers approved a […]

title: Huge commercial Chinese solid rocket launches 3 satellites from barge in the Yellow Sea
summary:
